title: Lion Safari Park and Lesedi Cultural Village Tour
description: This tour package near Johannesburg includes a guided tour of Lesedi Cultural Village showcasing five South African cultural groups, traditional lunch, song and dance performance, and a visit to Lion & Safari Park for a mini safari guided by a ranger in a malaria-free zone.

title: 5 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Dwyka Tented Lodge in Sanbona Wildlife Reserve offers luxurious, eco-friendly accommodation in a secluded horseshoe bend of a dry Karoo ravine. Each of the nine spacious tents features an en-suite bathroom, outdoor shower, private deck with a heated plunge pool, and modern amenities like air conditioning, a private minibar, and Wi-Fi. Guests can unwind in the stylish lounge, dine under the stars in the boma, or enjoy treatments at the Relaxation Retreat. The lodge combines comfort with a romantic wilderness setting, providing an unforgettable safari experience.

title: 4 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Experience the serene wilderness of Sanbona Wildlife Reserve during a 4-day safari at the Dwyka Tented Camp. Nestled in a secluded horseshoe bend, this luxurious camp blends seamlessly into the rugged beauty of the Little Karoo. Sanbona, one of South Africa’s largest private reserves, offers a conservation-focused safari where you can encounter diverse wildlife, explore ancient San rock art, and admire unique flora. Just 3.5 hours from Cape Town, the malaria-free reserve promises a tranquil escape filled with unforgettable game drives, scenic vistas, and the charm of the Western Cape’s natural heritage.

title: 3 Day Sanbona Luxury Dwyka Tented Lodge
description: Dwyka Tented Lodge in Sanbona Wildlife Reserve offers luxurious, eco-friendly accommodation in a secluded horseshoe bend of a dry Karoo ravine. Guests can unwind in the stylish lounge, dine under the stars in the boma, or enjoy treatments at the Relaxation Retreat. The lodge combines comfort with a romantic wilderness setting, providing an unforgettable safari experience.

title: 5 Day Sanbona Luxury Tilney Manor Tour
description: Enjoy a peaceful 5-day safari at Tilney Manor in the heart of Sanbona Wildlife Reserve. Surrounded by the rugged beauty of the Little Karoo, this historical manor offers magnificent views of undulating mountains and endless plains. With only six open-plan suites featuring private verandas, guests can indulge in secluded luxury while exploring the reserve’s diverse wildlife and ancient San rock art. Relax with authentic Karoo cuisine, unwind by the rim flow pool, or rejuvenate at the spa with a steam room and sauna, all set within a  conservation-driven wilderness just 3.5 hours from Cape Town. It’s the  closest true wildlife experience you can find near Cape Town, offering an exclusive and unique malaria-free safari.

title: 3 Day Coast Safari Tour
description: Experience the stunning beauty and serenity of the Garden Route while seizing the opportunity to encounter South Africa’s renowned Big 5 on a scenic safari tour. Journey from the southernmost tip of Africa to the oldest privately-owned game reserve in the Cape, and understand why the Garden Route is a favorite among tourists. Enjoy game drives in an open safari vehicle led by a knowledgeable ranger.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Garden Route

title: 5 Day Luxury Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge
description: Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge offers a truly luxurious escape, with its suites designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation. Each suite features a private deck and plunge pool, providing an intimate connection to the stunning natural surroundings along the Sand River.

title: 4 Day Luxury Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge
description: Welcome to Tengile River Lodge, a breath-taking sanctuary in Sabie Sands Game Reserve. This luxurious lodge offers an exceptional African wilderness experience, blending comfort and adventure amidst stunning scenery.

title: 3 Day Luxury Sabi Sands Tengile River Lodge
description:
Welcome to Tengile River Lodge, a breath-taking sanctuary in Sabie Sands Game Reserve. This luxurious lodge offers an exceptional African wilderness experience, blending comfort and adventure amidst stunning scenery. Guests can enjoy elegantly appointed suites with panoramic views of the river and landscape. The lodge features guided morning and sunset game drives and
bush walks (subject to availability) for encounters with diverse wildlife. With gourmet dining, rejuvenating wellness treatments, and attentive service, Tengile River Lodge is the ideal base for an unforgettable journey through one of South Africa’s most iconic game reserves.

title: 5-Day Luxury Timbavati Rockfig Safari Lodge
description:
RockFig Safari Lodge, located in the Timbavati Private Nature Reserve, is an exclusive lodge offering six luxury suites, spacious decks, and stunning views of the surrounding wilderness. The lodge focuses on personalized experiences for up to 12 guests, blending indoor and outdoor living, with a waterhole
nearby for frequent wildlife viewing. Guests enjoy game drives, walking safaris, and superb dining options. The lodge also offers a fire pit, boma dinners, and a focus on tailored luxury.

title: 4-Day Luxury Timbavati Rockfig Safari Lodge
description: RockFig Safari Lodge, located in the Timbavati Private Nature Reserve, is an exclusive lodge offering six luxury suites, spacious decks, and stunning views of the surrounding wilderness. title: 3-Day Luxury Timbavati Rockfig Safari Lodge
description: RockFig Safari Lodge, located in the Timbavati Private Nature Reserve in Greater Kruger, is an exclusive lodge offering six luxury suites, spacious decks, and stunning views of the surrounding wilderness. The lodge focuses on personalized experiences for up to 12 guests, blending indoor & outdoor living, with a waterhole nearby for frequent wildlife viewing. Enjoy game drives, walking safaris & superb dining options. The lodge also offers a fire pit, boma dinners, & a focus on tailored luxury.

title: 2 Day Radisson Kruger Fly-In Safari from Johannesburg
description:
Join us for an immersive 2 day bush experience like no other. On this incredible journey into Africa’s romantic safari world, see the best that the bush has to offer at the iconic Kruger National Park, as well as the pristine
Blue Canyon Reserve and Moditlo Private Game Reserve. Fly into Hoedspruit Eastgate Airport from Johannesburg and be met by your friendly guide for transport to the Radisson Hotel. Enjoy a tailored, catered experience that will leave no rock unturned in your quest for the ultimate African safari.

title: 2 Day Radisson Kruger Fly-In Safari from Cape Town
description:
Join us for an immersive 2 day bush experience like no other. On this incredible journey into Africa’s romantic safari world, see the best that the bush has to offer at the iconic Kruger National Park, as well as the pristine
Blue Canyon Reserve and Moditlo Private Game Reserve. Fly into Hoedspruit Eastgate Airport from Cape Town or Johannesburg and be met by your friendly guide for transport to the Radisson Hotel. Enjoy a tailored, catered experience that will leave no rock unturned in your quest for the ultimate African safari.

title: Ukutula Lion Park Day Trip
description: Located near Brits in the North West Province, Ukutula Lion Park is renowned for its dedication to wildlife conservation and educational experiences with Africa’s majestic predators. The park spans beautiful bushveld terrain, offering guests an opportunity to engage in unique lion interactions while learning about conservation efforts. Known as the “place of quiet,” Ukutula provides a peaceful yet thrilling environment where visitors can walk alongside lion cubs, interact with young lions, and gain insight into the behavior and preservation of these magnificent animals.

title: 15-Day Budget Southern Africa Tour from Cape Town
description: Join us on a captivating 15-day budget journey through South Africa and Zimbabwe. Explore iconic landmarks, coastal marvels, and local cuisine in Cape Town. Immerse yourself in Soweto’s cultural richness before before thrilling game drives in Kruger National Park. Experience a sunset cruise at Victoria Falls and wildlife encounters at Chobe National Park. This curated tour blends natural beauty, cultural immersion, and unforgettable experiences.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Johannesburg, Kruger National Park, Soweto, Southern Africa, Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe

title: 15-Day Luxury Southern Africa Tour from Cape Town
description:
Join us on a captivating 15-day journey through South Africa and Zimbabwe. Explore iconic landmarks, coastal marvels, and local cuisine in Cape Town. Immerse yourself in Soweto’s cultural richness before before thrilling game drives in Kruger National Park. Experience a sunset cruise at Victoria Falls
and wildlife encounters at Chobe National Park. This curated tour blends natural beauty, cultural immersion, and unforgettable experiences.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Johannesburg, Kruger National Park, Soweto, Southern Africa, Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe

title: 15-Day Mid-Range Southern Africa Tour from Cape Town
description: Experience a 15-day journey through South Africa and Zimbabwe, beginning in vibrant Cape Town. Explore iconic landmarks, coastal wonders, and indulge in local cuisine. Transition to Johannesburg for cultural immersion in Soweto before venturing into the wild at Tremisana Lodge for thrilling safaris. Fly to Victoria Falls for a breath-taking sunset cruise on the Zambezi River and a misty rainforest exploration. Wrap up your adventure with a day trip to Chobe National Park for wildlife encounters. This curated tour blends natural beauty, cultural  heritage, and unforgettable wildlife experiences.
location: South Africa, Cape Town, Johannesburg, Soweto, Southern Africa, Victoria Falls, Zimbabwe

title: Full Day Kruger Safari from Hazyview
description: Join us for a full-day guided safari in Kruger National Park, with convenient pickup from Hazyview or nearby lodges. We enter the park through Paul Kruger Gate, leading us into the renowned game-rich areas around Skukuza and Lower Sabie. These regions are known for frequent sightings of the Big Five and an abundance of wildlife along the Sabie River. With daily guaranteed departures and highly qualified guides, you’ll experience the best that Kruger has to offer in comfort and style. Lunch is at Skukuza Rest Camp, and our open 4×4 safari vehicles are designed specifically for optimal game viewing.

title: 3 Day Johannesburg Luxury Package
description: Discover Johannesburg and Pilanesberg National Park from one of Johannesburg and Sandton’s premium apartment hotels, The Catalyst Hotel, located less than a kilometre from the Gautrain Station in the heart of a sought-after business and leisure district in the city.

title: 5 Day Thakadu River Camp Safari
description: Take a five-day safari with MoAfrika Tours to visit the stunning Madikwe landscapes while staying in a world-class lodge. The resort’s skilled guide will take you on morning and evening wildlife drives in an open safari vehicle to get to know the area and its inhabitants.

title: 4 Day Thakadu River Camp Safari
description: Book a four-day safari with MoAfrika Tours and see the beautiful landscapes of Madikwe while staying in a world-class resort.

title: 3 Day Thakadu River Camp Safari
description: Have a three-day safari through Madikwe’s picturesque terrain with MoAfrika Tours and lodge in one of the luxurious Lodges. A three-day safari in Madikwe is the perfect way to become acquainted with the landscape and wildlife of this stunning private Big Five reserve.

title: 3 Day Inverdoorn Luxury Safari
description: Discover luxury, wildlife, and conservation beyond the Karoo’s heartbeat at Inverdoorn Private Game Reserve! Imagine this: 2.5 hours from Cape Town’s bustle, nestled amidst the vast, malaria-free Ceres Karoo, lies Inverdoorn.

title: 4 Day Kruger Shelati - Train on the bridge
description: Discover an unforgettable journey at Kruger Shalati: The Train on the Bridge, where history, luxury, and nature combine for a unique experience. Perched on a historic bridge, Kruger Shalati offers luxurious accommodation honouring the park’s rich past. Wake up to the serene sounds of the river and the African wilderness. The train pays tribute to past explorers while welcoming modern adventurers seeking a unique connection with nature. Step aboard to  experience Kruger’s rich history with modern comforts. Enjoy guided game drives, gourmet dining, and relaxing on luxurious decks. Join this 4-day tour for a luxury experience in a spectacular setting, creating cherished memories.

title: 5 Day Kruger Adventure Safari
description: Kruger Adventure Lodge is the ideal base for exploring the national park for which it is named. Situated in the small town of Hazyview, this unpretentious family-friendly lodge stands in large bushy grounds where you should look out for monkeys, bushbabies, small antelope and an abundance of birds. Amenities include a tempting swimming pool and popular restaurant. Only 15km away, Phabeni Gate provides access to a part of the Kruger National Park known for its quality Big Five sightings.

title: 4 Day Kruger Adventure Safari
description: Kruger Adventure Lodge is the ideal base for exploring the national park for which it is named. title: 3 Day Kruger Adventure Safari
description: Nestled in the heart of the African bushveld, Kruger Adventure Lodge offers a truly immersive experience in South Africa’s wilderness. The accommodation options cater to various tastes, from the rustic charm of safari tents to the luxurious comfort of forest suites. The safari tents provide a unique connection to nature, with canvas walls allowing the sounds of the wild to serenade you to sleep. Alternatively, the forest suites offer a more opulent stay, featuring modern amenities and panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. Both options promise a memorable and authentic African safari experience.

title: 2 Day Kruger Glamping Budget Adventure
description: Stay at the eco-friendly Sekekama Tented Camp, where fully solar-powered tents boast all the comforts of home—including beds, linens, and towels—and offer an unparalleled sleeping  experience akin to what you’d expect at a 4-star city hotel. The camp features a communal area for dining, socializing, and relaxing, as well as optional amenities such as a pool, bar, or restaurant, all adding up to exceptional value for money.

title: 5 Day Kapama Southern Camp Fly-In From Johannesburg
description: You will save valuable time by avoiding long road transfers and you adventure will just continue once you are met by a friendly guide at Eastgate for transport to the exclusive Kapama Southern Camp.  Here you will experience a level of luxury and the opportunity for wildlife encounters that rival the best in the Sabi Sands.  After arriving at the lodge, you can enjoy some refreshments and light snacks prior to your first game drive in the Kapama reserve where sightings of the famous Big Five and other wildlife may await.
location: South Africa, Kruger National Park, Fly in package

description: Fly into Hoedspruit Eastgate Airport from Cape Town and be met by your friendly guide for transport to Kapama River Camp.  Arrive at your exclusive lodge in time for coffee and light snacks before departing on your first game drive in the Greater Kruger National Park’s Kapama reserve.  Sightings of the fabled Big-5 and other animals are common, and rival the sightings found at the famous Sabi Sands.  Your stay includes luxury accommodations, all meals, drinks (soft drinks and alcoholic beverages), and exceptional service.  Kapama River Lodge is a festive and social safari lodge ideal for couples, families, and groups of friends.

title: 4 Day Luxury Call of the Wild Panorama and Safari Experience
description: This 4-day luxury safari at a budget price to the Kruger National Park, including the Panorama Route, is a fantastic way to experience the best of South Africa. The safari price is reasonable, all Kruger safaris are conducted in open safari vehicles, and the package offers a stay at the lovely Call of the Wild Lodge on the Hoedspruit Wildlife Estate, with breakfasts and dinners included.

title: 4 Day Sundown Country Estate Hotel Tour
description: Pilanesberg Game Reserve is a renowned safari location in South Africa. It is located in a malaria-free area and is only a 2-hour drive from Johannesburg, which is home to the Big 5 and known for its high concentration of wild animals.

title: 3 Day Sundown Country Estate Hotel Tour
description: Pilanesberg Game Reserve is a renowned safari location in South Africa. It is located in a malaria-free area and is only a 2-hour drive from Johannesburg, which is home to the Big 5 and known for its high concentration of wild animals.

description: Pilanesberg Game Reserve is a renowned safari location in South Africa. It is located in a malaria-free area and is only a 2-hour drive from Johannesburg, which is home to the Big 5 and known for its high concentration of wild animals.

title: 4 Day Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge Safari
description: Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge has been welcoming tourists to enjoy the thrill of an African safari for over 35 years. The resort, which overlooks a waterhole and an open plain, provides a unique combination of luxury, tradition, and adventure. Guests may anticipate large and elegantly designed rooms, world-class food, and dedicated service. What genuinely distinguishes Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge is its dedication to providing visitors with an outstanding safari experience. Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge is the ideal venue for a genuinely magnificent and amazing 4-day safari adventure.
location: South Africa, Johannesburg, Kruger National Park, Sabi Sands

title: 5 Day Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge Safari
description: For more than 35 years, Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge has welcomed visitors who want to experience the excitement of an African safari. The resort offers a distinctive fusion of luxury, history, and adventure, with views of a waterhole and an open plain. They can count on spacious, tastefully decorated accommodations, top-notch cuisine, and attentive service. Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge is distinguished by its commitment to giving guests a fantastic safari experience. The ideal setting for a truly stunning and fantastic 5-day safari excursion is Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge.
location: South Africa, Johannesburg, Kruger National Park, Sabi Sands

title: 3 Day Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge Safari
description: For over 35 years, Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge has been welcoming guests to experience the magic of an African safari. Overlooking a waterhole and an open plain, the lodge offers a unique blend of luxury, tradition, and adventure. Guests can expect to be pampered with spacious and beautifully appointed accommodations, world- class cuisine, and attentive service. But what truly sets Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge apart is its commitment to providing guests with an unforgettable safari experience. If you are  looking for a truly luxurious and unforgettable 3-day safari experience, Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge is the perfect destination.
location: South Africa, Johannesburg, Kruger National Park, Sabi Sands

title: 4 Day Mantobeni Luxury Safari
description: Big animals including elephants, rhinos, lions, and hippopotamuses can regularly be seen in the reserve. Between meals and game drives, visitors can unwind at the pool or go on guided walking safaris into the dense forest to observe the passing wildlife. Two daily game drives are offered in specialised 4×4 safari cars. The rangers would gladly share with you their extensive knowledge of everything that grows and lives in the area. Morning game drives take you deep into the Manyeleti concession and typically begin at half past five in the morning. You will pause the drive for a (much-needed) cup of coffee and some light fare.

title: 3 Day Mantobeni Luxury Safari
description: Big animals including elephants, rhinos, lions, and hippopotamuses can regularly be seen in the reserve. Between meals and game drives, visitors can unwind at the pool or go on guided walking safaris into the dense forest to observe the passing wildlife. Two daily game drives are offered in specialised 4×4 safari cars. The rangers would gladly share with you their extensive knowledge of everything that grows and lives in the area. title: 5 Day Khoka Moya Luxury Safari
description: Khoka Moya is the ideal location for an opulent family safari vacation as kids can also enjoy a variety of activities, including junior tracking, full game drives, and more. The opulent tents at the luxury camp feature expansive outside decks that are ideal for unwinding on while taking in the expansive channels that stretch out in front of the camp.

title: 4 Day Khoka Moya Luxury Safari
description: Situated on a riverbank in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa, Honeyguide Khoka Moya Camp is a true luxury tented safari camp located in the concession known as the Manyeleti Game Reserve, which borders the renowned Kruger National Park. Khoka Moya is the ideal location for an opulent  family safari vacation as kids can also enjoy a variety of activities, including junior tracking, full game drives, and more. The opulent tents at the luxury camp feature expansive outside decks that are ideal for unwinding on while taking in the expansive channels that stretch out in front of the camp.

title: 3 Day Khoka Moya Luxury Safari
description: Khoka Moya is the ideal location for an opulent family safari vacation as kids can also enjoy a variety of activities, including junior tracking, full game drives, and more. The opulent tents at the luxury camp feature expansive outside decks that are ideal for unwinding on while taking in the expansive channels that stretch out in front of the camp.

title: 5 Day Karongwe River Lodge Luxury Safari
description: You can spend the day relaxing by the pool or on your private patio, watching animals. In the afternoon, you can go on a safari in an open game drive vehicle. The view of the beautiful Makhutsi River is a natural treasure, and your large living room that opens onto a large terrace gives you many chances to see elephants and antelopes grazing. At Karongwe River Lodge, you can enjoy delicious Pan African food in a rustic outdoor Boma or, on other evenings, in the beautiful dining room. Dining is never been more romantic than when you are eating outside under the stars.

title: 4 Day Karongwe River Lodge Luxury Safari
description:
Spend the day relaxing by the pool or watching animals from your private patio before embarking on an afternoon safari in an open game drive vehicle. The magnificent Makhutsi River perspective is a natural treasure, and your big parlour room opening onto a large terrace affords numerous possibilities to see elephant and grazing antelope. Dining beneath the stars has never
been more romantic than when enjoying Pan African cuisine in a rustic outdoor Boma or, on alternate evenings, in the beautiful dining room. To accompany your meal, choose from a large selection of top South African and overseas beers and wines, as well as spirits and soft drinks.

title: 3 Day Karongwe River Lodge Luxury Safari
description: Spend the day lounging by the pool or watching the wildlife from your private terrace before departing on a late afternoon safari in an open game drive vehicle. The stunning vista of the Makhutsi River is a natural gem and your expansive parlour roomopening onto a large terrace provides opportunities to see elephant and antelope.

title: 5 Day Chisomo Camp Safari
description: Situated in the Big Five Karongwe Game Reserve of Limpopo, South Africa, the Chisomo Safari Camp offers visitors an unmatched four-day safari experience. Nestled deep within the reserve, the camp enjoys a stunning view of the Makhutsi River. Early in the morning and late in the afternoon, guests can go on safari in open 4×4 safari vehicles with knowledgeable guides and trackers by their sides. Over the day, visitors can choose to relax in one of the elegantly furnished lounges or beside the swimming pool.

title: 4 Day Chisomo Camp Safari
description: Located in Limpopo, South Africa’s Big Five Karongwe Game Reserve, the Chisomo Safari Camp provides guests with an unparalleled safari experience over the course of a four-day trip. The camp overlooks the Makhutsi River and is tucked deep within the reserve. Guests have the opportunity to go on safaris in open 4×4 safari vehicles early in the morning and late in the afternoon, escorted by experienced guides and trackers. In the course of the day, guests have the option of unwinding by the pool or in one  of the lounges that has been tastefully decorated.

title: 3 Day Chisomo Camp Safari
description: Chisomo Safari Camp overlooks the Makhutsi River and is nestled deep within the Big Five Karongwe Game Reserve in Limpopo, South Africa, providing an unrivalled safari experience during a 3-day safari. Guests enjoy safaris in open 4×4 safari vehicles in the early morning and late afternoon, led by skilled guides and trackers. During the day, visitors can unwind at the pool or in one of the elegantly appointed lounges.

title: Sani Pass Day Tour from Durban
description:
The tour begins in Durban and continues inland through the midlands of KwaZulu-Natal to the scenic town of Underberg, where the true adventure begins! Once you reach the summit, your senses have been stimulated beyond your wildest expectations. Take a deep breath of the crisp mountain air, take in the panoramic views that are nothing short of breath-taking, and take

title: Sani Pass and Lesotho Tour
description: It is a chance to explore an entirely new section of Kwa-Zulu Natal, which, during the winter months (May through September), can transform into a snowy winter wonderland. It is located in the West of KwaZulu-Natal, on the road between Himeville and Mokhotlong and crosses the Drakensberg Mountains by means of a gravel track with steep gradients and sharp hairpins, requiring a 4×4 vehicle and an experienced driver to navigate. At the top of the pass, you can find the Sani Mountain Lodge, which claims to have the highest pub in Africa.
